content: the rhode wristlet is quick make using less than 10 yards of yarn the simple stitch does all the work using the wide variety of lily s sugan n cream yarn you can make dozens of these for your next market event or only do one to corral your keys in your purse >> pattern uses standard american/us crochet terms >> skill level advanced beginner >> construction worked flat >> finished measurements included in the pattern yarn used lily s sugar n cream #4 worsted weight if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me i am happy to help if you post your finished project online i would love to see them you can tag me on instagram @slfcreations this pattern and all photographs in this listing and within the pdf document are the property of slfcreations and copywrite to sheri-lynn fournier this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed
